name: Div Transition Animation (-CyberationMicro-)
description:
This Transition effects all division sections. I recommend you only keep this at 0.20s to 1s and no more. This uses some CPU well in motion!

additional_info:
WARNING
This is a global style that affects every site! 
all sites act differently.  None are the same. If this is not for you. Please Uninstall it.


Known bugs.  Google search bar on chromium is a bit smaller.

Update: May 31,2014 Added Animation Off to disable.

discussions.name: How do I turn this off?? my cpu is going crazy on many sites
